title: [SOLVED] Smart ping and movement issues
body:
I have recently reinstalled league after a 4 month break and for some reason now i cant ping anything in game. i press g and my cursor changes but when i click my champion just moves to the location instead of just making a ping on the map. 

Also for some reason my champion always move to a location i click on the map instead of letting me just move there and they always move to where my cursor is when i click to move around items in my inventory to get them on the right key.

I appreciate any help anyone would be able to provide to help me fix this.

replies.body:
Your ping settings might have gotten a little borked somehow. Let's first try refreshing your config files really quickly to see if that does the trick!

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
- Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings
